column5: Hey Folks, I'll be up on Skeleton lake for a week starting tomorrow, if anyone else is on the lake, we should hook up and trade tips.  I can catch Lakers, I just haven't been able to get a Walleye and would love to hear some tips. Cheers, -Graeme
Don't buy $12 glasses of whiskey....  that's a start....
HAHAHA, yeah that's a pretty good tip I'd say.
I don't hear of too many people catching walleye on Skeleton...but you can always try 3-Mile just down the road if you've got wheels under your boat...

You know, I've been fishing there for the past 5 years, and I've never seen one.  Now a few guys I talk to catch them all the time even without fishing for them.  Every year in the derby some one pulls out a beauty....so I konw they're there, i just need to find'em.
Deep and slow .... and EARLY .. or LATE ... it wouldnt be my first choice for Walleye ... but they are in there (I hear)
Tip #1:  Learn to fish! Tip #2:  If tip #1 is impossible, invite your buddy IGotWorms over to show you how it's done.
